German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • audio
    		(file)
  • IPA(key): [ˈmɪtkɔmən], past tense IPA(key): [kaːm ˈmɪt], past participle IPA(key): [ˈmɪtɡəkɔmən]

Verb[edit]

mitkommen (class 4 strong, third-person singular simple present kommt mit, past tense kam mit, past participle mitgekommen, past subjunctive käme mit, auxiliary sein)

  1. to come with, to join and come along with (another person)
    Er kam (mit uns) mit.
    He came along (with us).
  2. to understand (something)

Synonyms[edit]

  • (to come with): mitgehen, begleiten
  • (to understand): begreifen, erfassen, kapieren, verstehen
